name: instability detected
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49; theme: Unstable. I had fun trying something a little different, using vector graphics this time. As usual I would have liked to add more if I had more time...

The html5 version, while convenient, runs slowly! Probably because I'm drawing everything in a custom, probably inefficient way...I've included a download for the .exe if you would like a better experience.

Thanks to Sara for the music.
